snippet.title: Path of Titans - Night Stalker Update Trailer
snippet.description:
The Night Stalker Update has brought new nocturnal abilities that'll have you checking every shadow... Are you ready to face the darkness or will you be consumed by it?

Available on all platforms on 10th of May 2023!

The abilities introduced in this update, such as Midnight Hunter and Night Stalker, will increase the thrills and perils of dinosaur combat in nighttime encounters. Small and midsized carnivores will see their prowess increased after dark with more than ten new and updated abilities. 

Ten brand new abilities, nine dinosaurs with combat updates, four remodeled and reanimated dinosaurs, three new AI critters, a new Replay cinematics system, and you.

Be the dinosaurs in this open world sandbox adventure, while surviving and thriving among 100+ other players and AI critters. Survive and thrive from your pick of 30 species, with three times more subspecies, from the Jurassic Era and other periods, and start out as your first hatchling today.

Available on all platforms on 10th of May 2023!

The abilities introduced in this update, such as Midnight Hunter and Night Stalker, will increase the thrills and perils of dinosaur combat in nighttime encounters. Small and midsized carnivores will see their prowess increased after dark with more than ten new and updated abilities. 

Ten brand new abilities, nine dinosaurs with combat updates, four remodeled and reanimated dinosaurs, three new AI critters, a new Replay cinematics system, and you.

Be the dinosaurs in this open world sandbox adventure, while surviving and thriving among 100+ other players and AI critters. Survive and thrive from your pick of 30 species, with three times more subspecies, from the Jurassic Era and other periods, and start out as your first hatchling today.
